category_subtitle: Super Bowl LX Week — Awards Night in San Francisco

rounds.pro_tip: CROWD DETAIL: Real crowd photos show natural variation — different heights, blurry faces in background, random clothing. AI crowds often clone faces or create eerie uniformity.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — golden football trophy on podium (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: REFLECTIONS: Real metallic surfaces reflect their actual environment. AI trophies often have generic, impossible reflections that don't match the surrounding scene.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic gold football trophy on velvet podium, dramatic spotlight, dark background, award ceremony, 8k'

rounds.pro_tip: LENS FLARE: Real photos capture authentic lens flare from bright lights — uneven, asymmetric, with ghosting. AI lens flares tend to be perfectly circular and symmetrically placed.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — aerial view of lit stadium at night (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: ARCHITECTURE SYMMETRY: Real stadiums have slight imperfections — uneven wear, random lighting. AI stadiums often look impossibly perfect and symmetrical.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic aerial view of American football stadium at night, packed crowd, bright lights, city skyline background, drone shot'

rounds.pro_tip: FABRIC WRINKLES: Real suits and clothing have natural, gravity-driven creases. AI fabric often has wrinkles that defy physics or look painted on.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — red carpet event with spotlights (DALL-E 3)
rounds.pro_tip: BACKGROUND PEOPLE: Look at people in the background. AI often generates figures with melted features, missing limbs, or merged bodies.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic red carpet event, velvet ropes, camera flashes, elegant backdrop with NFL logo, evening atmosphere'

rounds.pro_tip: MOTION BLUR: Real action shots have directional, consistent motion blur. AI motion blur is often applied randomly or inconsistently across the frame.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — close-up football on grass with stadium lights (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: TEXT ON OBJECTS: Look at text on the football. AI almost always generates garbled, nonsensical lettering — one of the easiest tells.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic extreme close-up of American football on grass field, stadium lights bokeh background, dramatic lighting, dew drops on leather'

rounds.pro_tip: DEPTH OF FIELD: Real cameras create natural bokeh with smooth falloff. AI often has abrupt focus transitions or inconsistent blur across equidistant objects.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — celebration confetti shower on stage (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: CONFETTI & PARTICLES: Real confetti has random shapes, varied rotation, and casts micro-shadows. AI confetti pieces often look copy-pasted or float impossibly.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic golden confetti shower falling on a dark stage, spotlights, celebration atmosphere, shallow depth of field'
